Comment: This is where the lesson begins. This is a o.k move for black. White will show the consequences of this move if black plays poorly.
White took advantage of black's "f6". For those who do not know, the white knight can't be taken OR ELSE.  A good move for black now is Qe7 which will regain the pawn.
And the game is already over if white knows what to do. In this case, white knew.
A very good move. g6 is horrible (Not the song) because it would lose the rook and a pawn after Qxe5+. Black's only "good" option is to move the king.
Before the bloodbath would begin, black resigned. Remember that this was played in the casual section of the tournament. Once again, great play by white.
